Platform.Title: JCVI PFGRC Mycobacterium smegmatis 25K v4 array designed primarily based on strain MC2 155
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: 4QMS, with arrayer GENETIX, machine cycles 0, pen id 0, pen cycles 0, operator 0, humidity control 0, humidity set point0.000
Platform.Description: This set includes 7148 oligonucleotides, has 25392 spots distributed in 48 blocks.

Column.Name: Primary Target
Column.Description: Locus primarily hit by the oligo

Sample.Title: Slow vs. Fast Replicate 1

Channel.Growth-Protocol: Prior to each experiment bacteria were loop inoculated from a cryo-culture (-80°C) onto a LBT plate and incubated for 3 days at 37°C. A colony was picked from the plate and inoculated into the 5 ml batch medium in a 30 ml glass universal and incubacted at 37°C on a rotary shaker at 200 rpm. At an OD between 0.3 - 0.5 a sample was withdrawn to inoculate the bioreactor (700 ml) to a starting OD600 of 0.005. The culture was then left in batch mode under oxystatic condition (maintaining an air saturation of 50% i.e. 10% dissolved oxygen concentration) until OD600 reached around 80% of maximum OD600 and then turned in to chemostat mode either at a dilution rate of 4.6 h-1 or 69 h-1. The chemostat was then left running for at least two volume changes before harvest.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Trizol following manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: 10 µg of total RNA were reverse transcribed and labelled in a two step protocol according to SOP M007 from TIGR (Hegde, P., Qi, R., Abernathy, K. & other authors (2000). A concise guide to cDNA microarray analysis. BioTechniques 29, 548-550, 552-544, 556 passim.)

Channel.Growth-Protocol: Prior to each experiment bacteria were loop inoculated from a cryo-culture (-80°C) onto a LBT plate and incubated for 3 days at 37°C. A colony was picked from the plate and inoculated into the 5 ml batch medium in a 30 ml glass universal and incubacted at 37°C on a rotary shaker at 200 rpm. At an OD between 0.3 - 0.5 a sample was withdrawn to inoculate the bioreactor (700 ml) to a starting OD600 of 0.005. The culture was then left in batch mode under oxystatic condition (maintaining an air saturation of 50% i.e. 10% dissolved oxygen concentration) until OD600 reached around 80% of maximum OD600 and then turned in to chemostat mode either at a dilution rate of 4.6 h-1 or 69 h-1. The chemostat was then left running for at least two volume changes before harvest.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Trizol following manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: 10 µg of total RNA were reverse transcribed and labelled in a two step protocol according to SOP M007 from TIGR (Hegde, P., Qi, R., Abernathy, K. & other authors (2000). A concise guide to cDNA microarray analysis. BioTechniques 29, 548-550, 552-544, 556 passim.)

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Hybrization performed according to SOP M008 from TIGR (Hegde, P., Qi, R., Abernathy, K. & other authors (2000). A concise guide to cDNA microarray analysis. BioTechniques 29, 548-550, 552-544, 556 passim.)
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Scanned Genepix 4000A scanner . Images were quantified using Spotfinder (TIGR).
Sample.Data-Processing: Total normalization and LOWESS normalization with MIDAS software (TIGR)

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: Normalized log2 ratio representing slow_50%_vs_fast_50% (log2 of PRE_VALUE)

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Hybrization performed according to SOP M008 from TIGR (Hegde, P., Qi, R., Abernathy, K. & other authors (2000). A concise guide to cDNA microarray analysis. BioTechniques 29, 548-550, 552-544, 556 passim.)
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Scanned Genepix 4000A scanner . Images were quantified using Spotfinder (TIGR).
Sample.Data-Processing: Total normalization and LOWESS normalization with MIDAS software (TIGR)

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: Normalized log2 ratio representing slow_2.5%_vs_slow 50% (log2 of PRE_VALUE)

Sample.Title: 0.6% vs. 50% air saturation Replicate 1

Channel.Growth-Protocol: Prior to each experiment bacteria were loop inoculated from a cryo-culture (-80°C) onto a LBT plate and incubated for 3 days at 37°C. A colony was picked from the plate and inoculated into the 5 ml batch medium in a 30 ml glass universal and incubacted at 37°C on a rotary shaker at 200 rpm. At an OD between 0.3 - 0.5 a sample was withdrawn to inoculate the bioreactor (700 ml) to a starting OD600 of 0.005. The culture was then left in batch mode under oxystatic condition (maintaining an air saturation of 50% i.e. 10% dissolved oxygen concentration) until OD600 reached around 80% of maximum OD600 and then turned in to chemostat mode either at a dilution rate of 4.6 h-1 or 69 h-1. The chemostat was then left running for at least two volume changes before harvest.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Trizol following manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: 10 µg of total RNA were reverse transcribed and labelled in a two step protocol according to SOP M007 from TIGR (Hegde, P., Qi, R., Abernathy, K. & other authors (2000). A concise guide to cDNA microarray analysis. BioTechniques 29, 548-550, 552-544, 556 passim.)

The culture was then left in batch mode under oxystatic condition (maintaining an air saturation of 50% i.e. 10% dissolved oxygen concentration) until OD600 reached around 80% of maximum OD600 and then turned in to chemostat mode either at a dilution rate of 4.6 h-1 or 69 h-1. The chemostat was then left running for at least two volume changes before harvest.

Series.Title: M. smegmatis response to energy- and oxygen-limitation in continuous culture
Series.Summary: Transcriptional profiling of M. smegmatis grown at 69h doubling time compared to 4.6h doubling time both at 50% air saturation. Transcriptional profiling of M. smegmatis grown at 69h doubling time with 50%, 2.5% and 0.6% air saturation.
Series.Overall-Design: Two-condition experiment. Biological replicates: 5 independently grown and harvested. One replicate per array.

Data-Table.Title: Combined means and p-values for biological replicates

Column.Name: mean(slow_50%_vs_fast_50%)
Column.Description: Gene mean for slow 50% vs. fast 50%

Column.Name: p-value(slow_50%_vs_fast_50%)
Column.Description: Raw p value for slow 50% vs. fast 50%

Column.Name: mean(slow_2.5%_vs_slow 50%)
Column.Description: Gene mean for slow 2.5% vs. slow 50%

Column.Name: p-value(slow_2.5%_vs_slow 50%)
Column.Description: Raw p value for slow 2.5% vs. slow 50%

Column.Name: mean(slow_0.6%_vs_slow_50%)
Column.Description: Gene mean for slow 0.6% vs slow 50%

Column.Name: p-value(slow_0.6%_vs_slow_50%)
Column.Description: Raw p value for slow 0.6% vs slow 50%
